system.description:
A self-enchantment for divination. The enchantment allows the caster to ask one yes/no question of the GM (simulating the character has divined the answer). The enchantment never reveals arcane secrets, and cannot predict the future.

The success roll is always made secretly by the GM. With MS, one piece of good information is learned. With CS; more detail is provided. CF causes the GM to mislead the caster, but does not normally cause misfire.

 

Bonus Effect

CML60+Caster may ask the GM a more complex question such as, “Where’s the nearest town?”

 

Time: 15-CSI minutes (Trance)

Range: Self

Duration: One Question
